document.full_text: with several of her main threats on the treatment table rather than the tennis court, world number one caroline wozniacki may never get a better chance to break her grand slam duck and win the french open.
document.title: wozniacki may never get better chance of slam in paris
lines_and_colors: with several of her main threats on the treatment table rather than the tennis court, world number one caroline wozniacki may never get a better chance to break her grand slam duck and win the french open.
